entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.7°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
